page.title: 08FARMING HISTORY
page.content: {SQUARES 3812 & 3912--***** FARM Home farm mentioned in page seven possesses a rare example of{LOCAL {HISTORY records,}namely a set of diaries that have been kept for the last one hundred years. They contain a daily record of the work carried out on the farm. They allow comparisons to be drawn between current practice and that of the past in such things as the time crops were sown or harvested and in the type of crop. They show that there has been very little change in the farm except for the increase in mechanisation and the related decrease in labour.
